column4: Anyone know how i would take an image of a remote ubuntu server with approx. 2GB of data on (10GB total) drive?  I need to restore the "image" locally so i can have an exact copy of the production system
dd command can make an image.
given that i only have 1 drive 10gb thats not full (75% free) would partitioning it had using the new partition as my drive be an option? or does dd work at the drive level?
